sample_table.help: Table describing each input sample, minimally containing the column 'fastq_filepath' with the name of each file to be analyzed. Control samples are indicated with a value of 'beads_only' in the column 'control_status'.

reads_prefix.help: Folder which contains the files listed in the sample table

fastq_stream_func.help: Set this as 'cat' if fastq files not g'zipped

peptide_table.help: Table describing each peptide in the library, minimally containing the column 'oligo' with the sequence used for each peptide

dataset_prefix.help: String which is prepended to all output files

output_pickle_xarray.help: Generate output files in xarray pickle format

output_tall_csv.help: Generate output files in tall CSV format

output_wide_csv.help: Generate output files in wide CSV format

replicate_sequence_counts.help: Flag for replicating counts for replicate sequences

run_cpm_enr_workflow.help: Flag for running cpm enrichment workflow

run_neg_binom_fit_predict.help: Flag for running negative binomial modeling

run_zscore_fit_predict.help: Flag for running Z-score enrichment analysis

summarize_by_organism.help: Flag used to control the summary of results by organism

peptide_org_col.help: Column in the peptide table indicating the organism for each peptide

peptide_seq_col.help: Column in the peptide table containing the peptide sequence (used to match against public epitopes)

max_overlap.help: Maximum allowed overlap between detected peptides

sample_grouping_col.help: Column in the sample table used for mapping replicates to samples

public_epitopes_csv.help: Optional, a CSV containing public epitopes

public_epitopes_col.help: In the public epitopes CSV, the column containing the translated amino acid sequence

nxf_profile.help: Profile used for resource allocation (options: standard / docker / cluster)
